title: Carling
description: The second book in the One True Child Series. Carling is only six when her family is slain by invading Romans. She is taken back to their fort as slave to the commander's wife. There she clings to her memories and her hatred. Carling discovers unexpected friends while avoiding the attentive eye of the commander's son. When her abilities start to emerge, she is swiftly sent away. Just as she begins to settle into herself, her life again is upended. She is forced to leave her new found love, Galen, and return to the Roman fort. Once again no longer free, she uncovers secrets, discovers her own strength, and battles evil foretold generations before.
author: L.C. Conn
